data.title: Beatrice Beatrice II, Countess of Burgundy
meta_keywords: Countess of Burgundy profile II de Bourgogne Duke Duchess
data.meta_description: Beatrice II, Countess of Burgundy  was Duchess consort of Merania.
data.text:
Background

She was a member of the Swabian Hohenstaufen dynasty, the daughter of Count Otto I of Burgundy and Margaret of Blois, thereby a granddaughter of Emperor Frederick Barbarossa.

Career

She was born in 1193, younger sister of Countess Joanna I of Burgundy. From the time of her father"s assassination at Besan√ßon in 1200, she was next-in-line to the County, eventually succeeding Joanna after her death in 1205. Otto III, Count of Burgundy

Agnes of Merania (1215-1263)

Beatrix of Andechs-Merania

Margaret

Adelaide, Countess of Burgundy

Elisabeth.
